name: Ordo Boost
text: If this mon uses a Normal type move, it increases it's Health stat by 3%.

name: Pyro Boost
text: If this mon uses a Fire type move, it increases it's Melee Attack stat by 3%.

name: Hydro Boost
text: If this mon uses a Water type move, it increases it's Ranged Attack stat by 3%.

name: Bio Boost
text: If this mon uses a Plant type move, it increases it's Melee Defense stat by 3%.

name: Electro Boost
text: If this mon uses a Electric type move, it increases it's Speed stat by 3%.

name: Cryo Boost
text: If this mon uses a Ice type move, it increases it's Speed stat by 3%.

name: Agro Boost
text: If this mon uses a Savage type move, it increases it's Health stat by 3%.

name: Putro Boost
text: If this mon uses a Gross type move, it increases it's Melee Attack stat by 3%.

name: Geo Boost
text: If this mon uses a Earth type move, it increases it's Melee Defense stat by 3%.

name: Aero Boost
text: If this mon uses a Air type move, it increases it's Ranged Defense stat by 3%.

name: Mytho Boost
text: If this mon uses a Mystic type move, it increases it's Ranged Defense stat by 3%.

name: Photo Boost
text: If this mon uses a Light type move, it increases it's Speed stat by 3%.

name: Umbro Boost
text: If this mon uses a Dark type move, it increases it's Melee Attack stat by 3%.

name: Etho Boost
text: If this mon uses a Spectral type move, it increases it's Melee Defense stat by 3%.

name: Techno Boost
text: If this mon uses a Metal type move, it increases it's Health stat by 3%.

name: Armo Boost
text: If this mon uses a Artillery type move, it increases it's Ranged Attack stat by 3%.

name: Lock In
text: When switching into this mon, it forces the opposing mon to only use moves that share it's typings.

name: Wonder Guard
text: This mon can only be damaged by super effective moves.
